author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Fix the discrepancy in the translation of the flat file for new scintillator version of HGCal

#### PR validation:

This corrected version is used to make the XML files for the V19 version

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx354D Fix the discrepancy in the translation of the flat file for new scintillator version of HGCal
